description: Looking for a cheap and easy family dinner? Try this tasty plant-based slaw burger recipe that only takes 15 minutes to cook.
name: Plant-based Slaw Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 extra soft jumbo hamburger bread rolls, split, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Combine v2mince® and sauce in a medium bowl. Divide and shape mixture into 4 patties.
Heat a greased barbecue grill on medium heat. Cook patties for 4 minutes each side, or until lightly charred and cooked through.
Place coleslaw in a medium bowl. Add 2 tbs of mayo and toss to combine.
Spread bun bases with remaining mayo. Top each with a pattie, slaw and coriander. Sandwich with bun tops. Serve.
